title: Delicious asparagus risotto
ingredients: ['300g asparagus, trimmed and cut into 2cm pieces', '1L chicken stock', '2 shallots, finely chopped', '40ml olive oil', '450g Arborio rice', '160ml dry white wine', '1 good knob butter', '30g grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
